entry.title: Pandas for Beginners
entry.summary:
Description

PyData Madrid 2016

During the workshop the main features and capabilities of Pandas library will be reviewed.

pandas is an open source, BSD-licensed library providing high-performance, easy-to-use data structures and data analysis tools for the Python programming language.

Main Workshop topics:

  • Main Data Structures.
  • I/O.
  • Basic statistical tools.
  • Data selection.
  • Grouping, aggregation, merge, join,...
  • Plotting.

Materials can be found here: https://github.com/PyDataMadrid2016/Conference-Info
